basics.label: Partner Account Manager
basics.summary: Over 6 years of customer facing management experience in managing Healthcare IT and Banking industry. Managed teams of 15 to 20 members and projects involving cross functional teams to achieve organizational goals.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Managed project with regard to the Customers product deployment in SaaS Platform.
highlights: Resolving In-service request through Jira and registering nodes and adding servers on SaaS Plaza platform.
Monitoring the Invoice and Billing on product renewals.
Setting up the Product demo environment for the Partners and their customers.
Assisted Partners with online training and educate them about the product usage in the cloud platform.

work.name: City
work.summary: Drive sales through Partners and Distributors.
highlights: Managed existing partners and generate revenues from them
Conducting promotional activities and events for partners and Distributors
Planning and implementing marketing and partner relations programs to increase partnership growth and retention

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Customers' acquisition in order to increase transaction book size.
highlights: Used Oracle SQL to analyses the financial data related to the customer borrowings of funds.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Receive Service Request(SR) from the HealthCare clients (Customers).
highlights: Analyze and study the SR thoroughly to ensure Compliance as per HIPAA and HCPC
Generate financial customized reports using SQL and EXCEL for customers.
Managed customer centric operations pre and post implementation.

awards.title: Best performer for two consecutive Months(HSBC)
Thanks award for the third quarter for closing the biggest deal across HSBC
